name: Inferno x 64
description:
Inferno x 64

Inferno x 64 is a minimalist first person shooter game with 64x64 resolution and retro aesthetic, made in 64 hours. 

Controls:  

  • keyboard & mouse to move
  • press Escape key to pause the game
  • hold Escape key to quit the game

Music by Andrew Hulshult and some sound effects are from OpenGameArt.com.

Note : I'm still working on the project to publish a more polished version of it, with a proper menu and more options.
